maps
Class MapReader

java.lang.Object
  maps.MapReader

public final class MapReader
extends java.lang.Object

A utility class for reading maps.

readMap

public static Map readMap(java.lang.String file)
                   throws MapException
Read a Map from a file and guess the format.

Parameters:
file - The name of the file to read.
Returns:
A Map.
Throws:
MapException - If there is a problem reading the map.

readMap

public static Map readMap(java.lang.String file,
                          MapFormat format)
                   throws MapException
Read a Map from a file using a particular format.

Parameters:
file - The name of the file to read.
format - The format to use. If this is null then the format will be guessed.
Returns:
A Map.
Throws:
MapException - If there is a problem reading the map.

guessFormat

public static MapFormat guessFormat(java.io.File file)
                             throws MapException
Guess the format for a Map.

Parameters:
file - The file to guess the format of.
Returns:
The most likely format or null if the file type is unrecognised.
Throws:
MapException - If there is a problem reading the file.
